title: CBC Radio
text:
James Mullinger and Derek Seguin are in Saint John, New Brunswick—Canada's only official bilingual province, keeping a London Eye on each other when they debate who has the best culture: the English or French.

British comedian James Mullinger double-decks anyone who questions Great Britain's cultural contributions.

England gave you Harry Potter. France gave you Caillou. - James Mullinger

But Quebecois comic Derek Seguin tries to make life Les Miserables for his opponent explaining why the French clearly come out on top.

At least French is a culture like with good food and good drink like cheese, wine, bread. Never have anybody say, 'Oh let's have some yummy London cheese!' - Derek Seguin

Keep a French Open mind and click play now!
description: James Mullinger and Derek Seguin are in Saint John, New Brunswick—Canada’s only official bilingual province, keeping a London Eye on each other when they debate who has the best culture: the English or French.
